title: Are Lunchbox’s Christmas Lights Still Up? + A Listener Who is a Computer Engineer Explains How Our Phones Track Us (Thursday Part 2)
itunes:title: Are Lunchbox’s Christmas Lights Still Up? + A Listener Who is a Computer Engineer Explains How Our Phones Track Us (Thursday Part 2)
description:
We get an update from Lunchbox to see if he’s still in his fight with his neighbor. Is he still turning his Christmas songs every night? Listener Daniel helped Bobby with insight on how our phones track us.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
